mapper.select: SELECT id, airline_id, departure_airport_id, arrival_airport_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flights (airline_id, departure_airport_id, arrival_airport_id, departure_time, arrival_time) VALUES (#{airlineId}, #{departureAirportId}, #{arrivalAirportId}, #{departureTime}, #{arrivalTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE flights SET airline_id = #{airlineId}, departure_airport_id = #{departureAirportId}, arrival_airport_id = #{arrivalAirportId}, departure_time = #{departureTime}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime} WHERE id = #{flightId}
